comment: Attendance is apart of grade; she hardly gives work and the textbook is online. Hardly any homework assignments, very laid back and cool professor. Just show her respect and don't sleep in her class!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Prof. Hein is a great choice! Attend class and you'll do really well. The lectures are fairly simple and directly correlate with the book. She has lots of real-world experience in the subject so the class materials are useful and applicable to real-life situations. She's also very accessible outside the classroom via phone for any questions.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Professor Hein is awesome. I have her for event management and my Sustainable Design class. She uses plenty of real world examples so you can better understand the material and so lectures aren't boring. She expects her students to try and if you do participate you'll do fine in the class. id definitely take her again

Professor Hein is such a nice lady! Event Management has been a fun class so far - not overwhelmingly or anything. She started doing online exams this semester which has been great too. Definitely take her!
She was an awesome professor to have as a first year student! She's an overall caring and understanding professor. You get only select few absences but her class isn't too boring to want to miss.
Lectures are straight from book. Several group projects, in class exams, fair expectations and helpful.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS
